name: overeducation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
more education than is necessary or helpful: Does unemployment lead to overeducation, or overeducation lead to unemployment? Concerns have been raised in many countries about the effect of over-education on the labour market. Related words
overeducate
overeducated
More examplesFewer examplesThey argued controversially that overeducation of women or the working classes was a waste of time and money.One of the greatest problems in the marketplace currently is overeducation.Over-education occurs when people have more educational qualifications than they need to do their job.
